div.p: We will be changing the distribution of the breakfasts and lunches for the health and safety of everyone involved. We would like to help limit exposure. The meals will be distributed on Mondays and Wednesdays only. Two lunches and breakfasts will be provided on Monday and three lunches and breakfasts on Wednesday. The routes will stay the same for those two days. But the time has been CHANGED to 10:30AM to 11:15AM This will begin next week Monday, April 27th.
The meal bags will have multiple meals and may be heavy. Please bring a large bag, box, or backpack to carry the meals home.
